txt.en: Matters of Hunt and Heart
DNT - Return to Mother Amma
Nósni is located in a camp north of Bazanmanar.\n\nKlátha has asked you to give her message of refusal to Nósni.

'The fangs and furs you brought me are perfect, friend. If you do not mind doing me another favour, would you be so kind as to bring the furs to the Lady Klátha? She will craft them into finest things! Klátha is stationed in a camp north of Bazanmanar. I shall meet you there as well.'
The pile of furs is next to Klátha, in northern Clovengap.\n\nYou should add your furs to the pile.
DNT - Nósni is in Bazanmanar, in northeastern Clovengap.\n\nYou should tell Nósni what Klátha said.

DNT - This appears to be an account of the sorceress' attempts at using the crystals on the sabre-tooth cats of Clovengap. 

'We are being sent back to the vineyards with more crystals. MAINDUDE insists I keep trying, no matter how many of my underlings the blasted cats devour. He gave me an adjustment to the ritual at least, so perhaps this time we shall have more luck.'

As you flip through the pages, a familiar looking piece of torn paper flutters loose.
DNT - A tumbled waggon!
DNT - Defeat Angmarim in the Clovengap vineyards ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Let me guess, furs from Nósni.'

Klátha sighs and rolls her eyes.

'Very well, add them to the pile, if you must.'
DNT - Defeat Angmarim in the Clovengap vineyards ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
DNT - Search for clues.
A hopeless romantic finds hope in the forest beneath the mountains.
Speak to Klátha
Return to Nósni
Klátha is located in Bazanmanar.\n\nYou should let Klátha know you have added your furs to the pile.
DNT - Examine the waggon
DNT - Another journal!
Klátha is located in a camp north of Bazanmanar.\n\nNósni has asked you to bring the furs to Klátha.
DNT - 'What have you found?'

'I know you meant no harm, friend, but please tell Nósni that I have no interest in speaking with him until he apologizes for what he did. A pile of furs, no matter how fine, will not change my mind.'\n\nKlátha huffs and refuses to say anymore.

DNT - In the crumbling vineyards of Clovengap, you have discovered an Angmarim waggon. \n\nThe Angmarim have intentions of creating abominations out of the already fierce sabre-tooth cats! You should defeat the Angmarim!
'What did she say? She was delighted, right?'
DNT - The waggon was carrying crystals!
'I shall meet you in the camp north of Bazanmanar!'
DNT - The Angmarim experiments were going to take place in the vineyards.\n\nWith the Angmarim defeated, you should look for clues about their experiments.
Talk to Klátha
DNT - Search for clues
Add furs to the pile
